/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.vendor.repository.master.VdVendorBrandDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE vd_vendor_brand
vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE brand_no = #{brandNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND vndr_no = #{vndrNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
